statements: SELECT * FROM study_personalized_medicine WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, genomic_data->>'gene' AS gene FROM study_personalized_medicine;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM study_personalized_medicine ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, clinical_data->>'diagnosis' AS diagnosis FROM study_personalized_medicine WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM study_personalized_medicine;
SELECT * FROM study_personalized_medicine WHERE patient_id = 100
SELECT patient_id, genomic_data->'name' AS genomic_name FROM study_personalized_medicine WHERE patient_id = 200
SELECT patient_id, clinical_data->'age' AS age, genomic_data->'mutations' AS mutations FROM study_personalized_medicine WHERE patient_id = 300
SELECT * FROM study_personalized_medicine WHERE genomic_data @> '{"gender":"female"}'
SELECT patient_id, jsonb_array_length(genomic_data->'mutations') AS num_mutations FROM study_personalized_medicine WHERE patient_id = 500
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, mutation_type FROM genomic_data WHERE mutation_frequency >= 0.05;
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, disease FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE disease LIKE '%cancer%'
SELECT patient_name, disease, mutation_type FROM patient_data JOIN genomic_data ON patient_data.patient_id = genomic_data.patient_id WHERE mutation_frequency > 0.05 AND disease = 'Diabetes'
SELECT patient_name, gene_name, mutation_type, mutation_frequency FROM patient_data JOIN genomic_data ON patient_data.patient_id = genomic_data.patient_id ORDER BY mutation_frequency DESC
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age, gender, COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_data GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_patients DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM clinical_data WHERE diagnosis='Cancer';
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE mutation_status='Positive' ORDER BY genomics_id DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age < 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'

SELECT p.name, g.dna_sequence, c.diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN genomic_data g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id JOIN clinical_data c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id WHERE g.mutation_status = 'Positive' AND c.diagnosis = 'Cancer'

SELECT p.*, g.dna_sequence, c.treatment_plan FROM patients p JOIN genomic_data g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id JOIN clinical_data c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id WHERE p.age < 50 ORDER BY p.name ASC, g.genomics_id DESC

SELECT p.name, g.mutation_status, c.diagnosis, c.treatment_plan FROM clinical_data c JOIN genomic_data g ON c.patient_id = g.patient_id JOIN patients p ON c.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE c.diagnosis LIKE '%Leukemia%'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, DOB FROM patients WHERE genotype='AA';
SELECT * FROM labs ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT patient_id, lab_test, result FROM labs WHERE recorded_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT treatment_id, genotype, therapy_type FROM treatments WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE genotype='ABCD' ORDER BY last_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients JOIN labs ON patients.patient_id=labs.patient_id WHERE lab_test='blood test' AND result>10 GROUP BY last_name ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, genotype, associated_trait FROM genotypes WHERE associated_trait='diabetes' AND genotype LIKE 'A%' AND genotype IN ('AAAA', 'ABCD');
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND therapy_type='medication' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, DOB FROM patients WHERE DOB<='1990-01-01' AND first_name NOT LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY DOB ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patient
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patient WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT clinical_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM clinical_data ORDER BY clinical_id DESC
SELECT genomic_id, gene_name, variation FROM genomic_data WHERE mutation_type='Missense'
SELECT study_name, lead_researcher, start_date, end_date FROM research_study
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE age > 50
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patient ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM patient JOIN clinical_data ON patient.patient_id = clinical_data.patient_id
SELECT study_id, study_name, lead_researcher FROM research_study WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT drug_name, target_gene, impact_score FROM drug_interaction ORDER BY impact_score DESC
